/**
 * @file 文本文件变量替换处理器
 * @author errorrik[errorrik@gmail.com]
 */
 
var util = require('util');
 
var AbstractProcessor = require('./abstract');
 
/**
 * 变量替换处理器
 *
 * @constructor
 * @param {Object} options 初始化参数
 */
function VariableSubstitution(options) {
    AbstractProcessor.call(this, options);
}
util.inherits(VariableSubstitution, AbstractProcessor);
 
VariableSubstitution.DEFAULT_OPTIONS = {
    name: 'VariableSubstitution',
    variables: {}
};
 
/**
 * 构建处理
 *
 * @param {FileInfo} file 文件信息对象
 * @param {ProcessContext} processContext 构建环境对象
 * @param {Function} callback 处理完成回调函数
 */
VariableSubstitution.prototype.process = function (file, processContext, callback) {
    if (typeof file.data === 'string') {
        var variables = this.variables;
        file.setData(
            file.data.replace(
                /\{edp-variable:(\{?)([0-9a-z_-]+)(\}?)\}/ig,
                function (match, $1, name, $3) {
                    return variables[name] || '';
                }
           )
       );
    }
 
    callback();
};
 
module.exports = exports = VariableSubstitution;
 
Generated by istanbul at Fri May 15 2015 10:30:41 GMT+0800 (CST)
